job.title: Data Scientist-NLP
job.description: Stackline is an allinone ecommerce platform for brands and retailers By combining market intelligence advertising automation workflow management and operational analytics into a single platform Stackline delivers the industryleading operating system for companies to scale their online retail business globally Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Seattle with additional offices in Minneapolis and London Stackline is on a mission to engineer the worlds most powerful data tools and services for commerceltbrgtltbrgtIn June 2021 Stackline received a 130 million strategic investment from TA Associates a leading global growth private equity firm This was followed by a 50 million investment from Goldman Sachs Growth Equity in November 2020 Stackline will utilize TAs capital to continue growing the companys product offerings and expanding its global footprintltbrgtltbrgtStacklines extensive brand list includes retail stalwarts such as Starbucks Sony General Mills Mondelez and Levis In 2020 the company helped its clients grow their online businesses while continuing to diversify its technology offeringsltbrgtltbrgtJoin our team as a Data Scientist and you will help leading consumer brands use data and technology to discover insights improve decisionmaking and transform their businessesltbrgtltbrgtAs a Data Scientist at Stackline you will work in a fastpaced teamfocused environment developing applied machine learning solutions to provide predictive analyticsltbrgtltbrgtAs a key member of our team you will use your experience to analyze and glean insights from massive data pipelines as we process ingest and cleanse over a billion data points each week You will be working closely with Data Engineers Software Engineers and Product Management teams to deliver high quality data products This is a very handson analytical role where a large part of your time is spent writing code while the remainder is spent architecting developing and testing new modelsltbrgtltbrgtWere looking for applied data scientists to come in ready to explore our diverse array of datasets in order to develop models that have direct impact on our productsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtConduct endtoend analyses from data requirement gathering in addition to data processing and modelingltligtltligtArchitect data and modeling pipelinesltligtltligtPartner with crossfunctional teams to identify new opportunities requiring the use of modern analytical and modeling techniquesltligtltligtUtilize machine learning techniques to design algorithms for anomaly detection search recommendation engines and natural language systemsltligtltligtUse existing insights and develop new strategies to drive the product strategyltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtltugtMinimum QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtMasters in Mathematics Computer Science NLP or another technical fieldltligtltligtDemonstrated experience with Python and SQLltligtltligtDemonstrated experience in machine learning tools such as Pytorch Tensorflow or sklearnltligtltligt2 year of direct industry work experience in one or more of the following areas data science data analytics or data engineeringltligtltligt2 year experience with statistics and probability particularly their application in systems analysis and operations researchltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltulgtltligtPrior experience with big data technologies such as Hadoop or SparkltligtltligtDemonstrated experience designing and building new ideas working closely with technical teams from concept generation through implementationltligtltligtExperience with AWS Docker AirflowltligtltligtPhD in Engineering Mathematics Computer Science or another technical fieldltligtltligtExperience working in a startup retail digital advertising or ecommerce environmentltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtBenefits and Perks Its important each and every employee feels they are supported and can complete their lifes best work today and in the future We are investing in each person not only with competitive compensation but also with industry leading benefits and perks A few ways we support our employees is by offeringltbrgtltbrgtltligt 100 paid health medical and vision for employees and qualifying dependentsltligtltligt Company 401k planltligtltligt 20 days of PTO with no accrual or tenure neededltligtltligt 7 company holidaysltligtltligt Paid Maternity and Paternity leave  20 weeks for new mothers and 12 weeks for new fathersltligtltligt Summer Fridays at 2pmltligtltligt Catered lunches each Friday in the officeltligtltligt Fully stocked kitchen snacks with weekly fresh fruitltbrgtltbrgtltligtltemgtStackline is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race religion gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin genetics disability age or veteran statusltbrgtltbrgtltemgt
